articles.author: Rick Porter
articles.title: ‘The Peripheral’ Season 2 Scrapped at Amazon - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The tech giant's Prime Video cites the writers and actors strikes in undoing a renewal for the series from 'Westworld's' Lisa Joy and Jonathan Nolan.
articles.content:
The Peripheral has had its second season renewal at Amazon’s Prime Video undone, putting an end to the sci-fi series. 
The un-renewal comes during strikes by Hollywood writers and actors, and source… [+2153 chars]

articles.title: Burj Khalifa-sized asteroid, 4 other space rocks hurtling towards Earth; check speed, other details - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed details about 5 asteroids that will pass by Earth closely in the next few days. Shockingly, one of them is a Potentially Hazardous Asteroid that is nearly as big as the Burj Khalifa, the tallest building in the world! Know details.
